C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution
Prevent containers from allowing command execution

containers.name: garbage-collector
command: kubectl replace -f /osm-crds; kubectl delete --ignore-not-found meshconfig -n 'default' osm-mesh-config; kubectl delete --ignore-not-found secret -n 'default' osm-ca-bundle; kubectl delete --ignore-not-found meshrootcertificate -n 'default' osm-mesh-root-certificate; kubectl delete mutatingwebhookconfiguration -l app.kubernetes.io/name=openservicemesh.io,app.kubernetes.io/instance=osm,app.kubernetes.io/version=1.3.9,app=osm-injector --ignore-not-found; kubectl delete validatingwebhookconfiguration -l app.kubernetes.io/name=openservicemesh.io,app.kubernetes.io/instance=osm,app.kubernetes.io/version=1.3.9,app=osm-controller --ignore-not-found;
